header.title: ‘Everything changed’ Meghan Markle reveals ‘challenges’ being Prince Harry’s girlfriend
header.subtitle: MEGHAN Markle has revealed how her life was turned upside down after news of her relationship with Prince Harry went public as she spoke for the first time about her royal boyfriend.
header.postText: 'Ms Markle, 36, has spoken candidly about her great love story  for the first time amid a whirlwind of rumours and gossip about the celebrity couple.', 'She revealed the pair met through friends in London and dated secretly for months before the Sunday Express broke the story in October last year.', 'Speaking about the public revelations, she said: Right out of the gate it was surprising the way things changed.But I still have this support system all around me, and, of course, my boyfriend’ s support.', 'It has its challenges, and it comes in waves— some days it can feel more challenging than others.', 'The interview, with Vanity Fair magazine, is believed to have been conducted after being OK'd by Prince Harry and Kensington Palace.', 'The 32 - year - old Prince, who is set to become an uncle for the third time after it was announced yesterday that the Duchess of Cambridge is pregnant, has been particularly protective of his girlfriend after the media storm that followed the news of the pair 's relationship.', 'In a statement released by Kensington Palace, fears for Ms Markel 's safety were raised and Harry asked for her privacy to be respected following a smear on the front page of a national newspaper; the racial undertones of comment pieces; and the outright sexism and racism of social media trolls and web article comments.', 'Despite the rush of media coverage late last year, the Suits actress revealed that the young couple are very happy at the moment and are making plans for the future.', 'She said: I’m sure there will be a time when we will have to come forward and present ourselves and have stories to tell, but I hope what people will understand is that this is our time.', 'This is for us. It’s part of what makes it so special, that it’s just ours. But we’re happy. Personally, I love a great love story.', 'She revealed she doesn’t read the extensive press coverage of their relationship, and hopes to not be affected by any public interest.', 'She said: I don’t read any press. I haven’t even read press for Suits.', 'The people who are close to me anchor me in knowing who I am. The rest is noise.'

commentThread.commentText: Well, I have thought for ages Waity Katy, Silly Willy and the Ginger Whinger were just like a bunch of third rate celebs, and now we have another.  She doesn't half think a lot of herself, doesn't she?
Didn't she just break royal protocol by talking to the press about her relationship with a senior member of the Royal family??? I thought it was an absolute NO NO????
She doesn't belong into the royal family she is not even british or white and an actor on top with all this closing what she put on is not in the interest of the royal family

Anyone who rushes off to the press in this way is obviously unsuitable to be a member of the Royal Family, where discretion should be part of the job.  Alas, this tiresome trend of airing your personal views in public was started by Diana and seems to have been inherited by her sons.

replies.commentText: Oh you think she didn't cover it beforhand?

commentThread.commentText: Well they should get a 1 bed flat in Tower Hamlets easy enough given his connections,
She seems a very nice lass. The very best of good fortune to both of them - and may the media keep its dirty nose out of things that don't necessarily concern it!

replies.commentText: ever had a girlfriend? may not

commentThread.commentText: Well neither she nor Harry can complain about press intrusion again, after she has deliberately with Harry's agreement given this interview.

replies.commentText: Depends on the nature of the intrusion. Anyone is free to moan about some things and agree to others.
But....... there's press intrusion and press intrusion, isn't there. It all depends on which piece of the press is doing the reporting.

commentThread.commentText: the royal bloodline must not be contaminated in this manner ... did he learn nothing from his mothers death... ?

replies.commentText: Oh for goodness sake, grow up!
But she isn't a Moslem. and Harry is far enough away from the throne for race to not matter if indeed it ever should.

commentThread.commentText: Harry if your happy go for it, nothing worse than regretting it in the future.

replies.commentText: we know that katie price is not happy,get in there harry then you will make a lot of people happpy ,she has to be more suitable than meghen and yes i am being sarcastic

commentThread.commentText: Maybe it is not worth the money give up dear and go for a pop star
i wish these two all the best but the flood gates will open to all those bitter twisted trolls who will now have a field day
